runs.comm: Pakistan begin well, pitched up outside off and it's smacked over extra cover by the captain's opening partner for a boundary
pushed into the off side, in front of mid-off
that's disappeared, pitched up outside off and he swings it miles over the deep square leg boundary, into the crowd
low full toss outside off, gets forward and just pushes it to cover
fullish, slower one, pushed towards cover
short of a good length outside off, moving away and he pokes at it, misses
shortish on middle, punched past extra cover, Nathan McCullum slides but cant prevent the single
Pakistan are racing away, banged in short and Hafeez picks it well, pulls it into the crowd behind deep square leg
good length on middle, pushed down the ground to mid-on and they've stolen a quick single
into the crowd, what entertainment, short and wide and it's slapped over the cover boundary, dropped in the crowd by someone who had a drink in the other hand
gone! Bowled off a full toss, on middle stump, made room and tried to crash it through the off side, missed and timber! Tame dismissal in the end, New Zealand break through
well fielded at short fine leg, short of a good length on middle, clipped towards short fine and Mills does superbly stretching to his right
lands on a good length outside off, holds its line, leaves it alone
goodish length on the off again, rocks back to punch it towards mid-off
pitched it up slightly, pushed it towards mid-on for a single
a single to mid-on again, pitched it up, just played it firmly wide of the fielder for one more
good length on the off, tries to swing it over mid-on but doesn't quite get hold
good length on leg stump, clipped it over square leg for a single
a tight line outside off, pushed gently towards cover, thought of a single but it wasn't there
back of a length outside off, runs it down towards third man for a single
short of a good length, dropped it in front of extra cover, sneaks in a quick run
length ball outside off, tries to swing it past the in-field on the leg side, mistimes it, still there's a single wide of midwicket
found the gap, superbly timed, full toss, came down the track and caressed it past he diving extra cover and wide of mid-off for a boundary
Southee drops it slightly short, pulled away to deep square leg for a single

fell just short of Taylor, pitched it up outside off, came down the track to drive it past mid-off, played it uppishly and Taylor right at the edge of the circle, took it on the half-volley, he wasn't sure himself but replays confirm that fell short
short ball outside off, slapped it towards mid-off, a quick single again, there've been plenty of those this innings
found the gap, lovely placement, third man is up and he knew it, slower one bowled short and he steered it between short third man and point
the scoop and it lands just in front of the ropes, good length and he just chips it over short fine leg, another four
angling in towards middle, gets forward and works it through to deep square leg for a single
short ball down the leg side, a poor ball first up, helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
back of a length on the off, drops it in front of the bowler on the leg side, Shehzad wants the single and runs halfway down the pitch before being sent back, almost collides witu Butler, almost
four more, third man is up and that's smartly done, good length, he moves away and slices it over that fielder, runs coming easily here
slower one bowled on a length on middle, plays it with soft hands wide of mid-off for a single
slower one bowled short on leg stump, turned wide of square leg for a single
nipping in from a good length, clipped uppishly wide of square leg for a single
tossed up, bowled on a length outside off, driven towards cover
held it back, comes down the track and cracks it through point, Guptill returns an accurate throw to the non-striker's end, just the single
pushes it in front of extra cover for a quick single
slog-sweep, full on leg stump, tries to smack it over square leg, struck on the pads, would have gone down
dropped a sitter at mid-off, pitched up and it's struck straight to Ross Taylor and he spills an easy one, depriving Woodcock of a maiden wicket in T20 internationals, only for the time being
short of a good length outside off, turning away, guides it towards short third
good length on the off stump, opens the face to play it towards third man for a single
angling in towards leg stump, clipped through square leg for a single
nicely done, short on the off, mid-off is up and Shehzad just punched it over Taylor to earn another boundary
pushed it full on middle, driven towards deep cover for a single
short and it;s a top edge, trying to pull it past short fine, takes the top edge and lands short of Guptill running in from deep square leg

New Zealand have broken through, short ball outside off and Shehzad tried to repeat that punch he had executed earlier in the over, only this time he got a lot more elevation and found Styris at deep extra cover, who ran to his right and judged it well

run-out, Hafeez is gone now, Akmal must take the blame, short outside off, Akmal cuts it wide of deep point, they complete the single and he calls for the second only to send Hafeez back after he's covered a good amount of ground down the pitch, it's a good throw to the keeper McGlashan who takes off the bails to find Hafeez miles short as he tries to get back
pushed into the off side
bowling it full on middle, pushed down the ground for a single to long-on
turned away, bowled flat, going for the cut, misses
drops it into the off side wide of Ryder who cuts it off well to prevent them from taking a single
flicked away through square leg for a single
short and wide, holding its line, Akmal makes room to cut, misses
on middle and leg, turns the face to play it gently past square leg, enough time to get back for the second and the fielder overruns the ball but no damage done
short on middle, goes for a pull over midwicket, mistimes it straight to the fielder
slightly short on the off, dabbed in front of point for a quick single

More trouble for Pakistan, Younis goes, McCullum slowed it up from round the wicket, landed on a good length and went on straight, Younis opened the face slightly to play it behind point, probably expecting it to turn in a hint, got a thin edge and McGlashan made no mistake. New Zealand are in control now
cut away behind point for a brace
on middle and off, plays it back down the pitch
shortish outside off, chops it behind point for a single
floating it around leg stump, gets across slightly to play it into the leg side
quicker through the air, flat on middle and leg, gets forward to defend, an inside edge onto the pads and a quick single
sliding on the pads, tries to clip it fine, probably brushed the pads there to roll down wide of short fine
goodish length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, slower through the air, cut past point
fullish outside off, went on straight, gets a thick outside edge towards point
shortish on middle and leg, turned away behind square for one more
shortish on leg stump tickles it off the back foot down to short fine
shortish on the off, rocks back and cracks it to point, not enough this for Pakistan
nicely done, comes down the track and lofts it inside out over extra cover for a couple of runs
looping it towards middle and leg, flicked away through midwicket
struck hard, drilled past the bowler on the bounce to long-off but Franklin's alert in the deep
makes room to crack that over mid-off, mistimes it back to the bowler
quicker delivery on middle and leg, chipped past square leg for one more
length ball outside off and it's a shot of desperation that works, fetches it from outside off and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket for a massive six
fires it straight on middle, makes room to smack it over the off-side field and misses, the stumps take a beating and Pakistan sink further
shortish outside off, cuts it through point for a single
short and wide, goes for the cut but cannot connect, fired it quick and McGlashan took it well
slowish on middle and leg, turned past square leg
short on middle, gets back and pushes it to extra cover
low full toss on the off stump, driven hard towards extra cover
Razzaq cashes in on the short one, seized the length early and hammered it over the deep midwicket boundary, off the meat, a crowd killer, most of his hits are
full and wide, makes room to cart it over extra cover, the shot was on but it appeared to move away a hint to beat the bat
length ball outside off, drags it down towards long-on for a single
full outside off and Umar's trying to paddle it square, misses, almost a wide but the umpire doesn't call it
bowls it full on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
driven down past extra cover for a single
Razzzaakkkkk, full outside off, smashes it hard over long-off for a flat six, they'll need a few more of those
gone! A decisive blow, slowed it up quite a bit there and went on straight, Razzaq waited for it and went for the cut, got a thick edge and McGlashan's having a good day

lovely running catch from Guptill in the deep and McCullum's on  a hat-trick, he's fielded well all day has guptill, Gul tries to smote it over deep square leg and connects, gets a little too much elevation on that one but it appears it has enough on it to go all the way, Guptill, though, is at the edge of the ropes and runs a few yards to his right to take it just inside the boundary
prevents it, short on the off, moves all the way back and defends it back to the bowler, not again
pushed away into the off side, ends an excellent spell from McCullum
good length on middle, cracked down the ground to long-on
fetches it from outside off and drags it to long-on
full outside off, slices it over point and it's dropped by Guptill who runs in from deep point, a rare lapse
smacks it straight back towards the bowler who palms it off to the stumps at the non-striker's end, but Riaz is in
aiming for the blockhole, squeezes it past midwicket for a couple of runs
slower one bowled short outside off and he tries to swing it over midwicket but doesn't quite pick the change in pace, misses
short on the off, swatted back over the bowler's head, swatted so well the ball actually curves in the air and lands just short of the ropes
struck on the helmet, bangs it short, goes for a pull but misses, struck on the grill as he takes his eyes off it, a run-out chance at the bowler's end as he doesn't land his bat in time
yorker length from the bowler, tries to squeeze it into the leg side does Riaz but can't get his bat down in time
pushed away past midwicket for a single
makes room and Southee chases him, hits the blockhole and Umar can only dig it out into the leg side and settle for a single
full outside off, drilled towards mid-off, only a single there
nicely struck, chased a wide one and creamed it towards deep cover
full and wide, a bit of swing there, tries to reach for it, can't get there
wide called this time, too full and too wide, Akmal still can't get to it but it's called a wide this time
full and he tries to drag it past midwicket, it's way outside off and he ends up slicing it over extra cover
flat six, length ball and it's come off the meat, in fact it's a low full toss and he smacks it hard, Southee's in a position to catch it at long-off but drops it, palming it over the ropes
low full toss again, a single to long-off to keep the strike
played down towards deep midwicket for a single
gone, holes out to long-on, pitched up on middle and it's lofted straight to the fielder in the deep, comfortable catch to McCullum, an off day for Akmal with the bat though he kept really well
another one, Southee's on a hat-trick again, length ball and it's smacked straight into the palms of McCullum at long-on,a repeat of the previous ball
struck on the pads but was going down, full but outside leg stump and Shoaib doesn't get a bat to it
full toss, an inswinging full toss, Shoaib made room to cut and got a thick outside edge past the keeper
full and it's driven wide of extra cover for a single, New Zealand have won comprehensively and take the series
